articles.author: Zachary Evans, Zachary Evans
articles.title: Stock Markets Continue to Nose Dive as Worst Week Since 2008 Financial Crisis Closes
articles.description: Panic over a Wuhan coronavirus pandemic sent stocks tumbling again on Friday morning.

articles.author: NR Staff, NR Staff
articles.title: Just How Concerning Is the Coronavirus?
articles.description: Rich, Michael, Luke, Alexandra, and Jim discuss the coronavirus and the Born-Alive bill in the Senate during The Editors podcast.

articles.author: Michael Brendan Dougherty, Michael Brendan Dougherty
articles.title: The Wrong Trump
articles.description: With the coronavirus in the air, we need the version who’s not afraid to attack the problem.

articles.author: Zachary Evans, Zachary Evans
articles.title: Iranian MP Says Government is Concealing ‘Horrific Numbers’ of Coronavirus Deaths: ‘It’s Not As If We Can Hide the Cemeteries’
articles.description: An Iranian member of Parliament on Friday said cases of the Wuhan coronavirus in the country were much more widespread than officials have reported.

articles.author: Zachary Evans, Zachary Evans
articles.title: White House Chief of Staff Mick Mulvaney Downplays Coronavirus Threat: ‘This is Not Ebola’
articles.description: Mick Mulvaney downplayed the threat of the Wuhan coronavirus, implying the illness would not be as destructive as other epidemics seen in the past few decades.

articles.author: Tobias Hoonhout, Tobias Hoonhout
articles.title: House Republicans Warn Dem Leadership Plans to Package FISA Reauthorization with Coronavirus Funding to Avoid Real Reform
articles.description: Rep. Tim Burchett, along with 37 other House Republicans, sent a letter on Friday to House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and Majority Leader Steny Hoyer, warning them not to play “political games” by proposing a coronavirus-FISA package.

articles.author: David Beckworth, David Beckworth
articles.title: It’s Time for the Fed to Take On the Coronavirus Threat
articles.description: The central bank can’t stop a supply shock, but it can mitigate the fallout.

articles.author: Katherine Timpf, Katherine Timpf
articles.title: Students Demand Their School Treat Coronavirus-Themed Party as a ‘Hate Crime’
articles.description: The students involved should be ashamed of themselves, and the students who knew better shouldn’t hesitate to shame them, but that’s as far as it should go.

articles.author: Michael Brendan Dougherty, Michael Brendan Dougherty
articles.title: Quarantine Idiocy
articles.description: I'm probably on the slightly more paranoid end of the spectrum when it comes to coronavirus.

articles.author: Ramesh Ponnuru, Ramesh Ponnuru
articles.title: The Fed Should Cut Rates
articles.description: The Fed cannot prevent all the harms that a coronavirus epidemic could do to the economy. But it can and should keep some other potential effects in check.

articles.author: Daniel Tenreiro, Daniel Tenreiro
articles.title: Passive Tightening
articles.description: Economist David Beckworth explains how the supply shock caused by the coronavirus can lead to a demand shock if the Federal Reserve does not cut rates.
